snippet: The suspected gunman, James E. Holmes, was described as being eerily calm and detached from the chaos he had created.
abstract: Officers of Colorado's Aurora Police Department testify at preliminary hearing to determine whether there is enough evidence to try James E Holmes for killing 12 people and wounding dozens more during July 2012 shooting spree inside Century 16 movie theater; describe Holmes as being eerily calm after shooting.

byline.original: By JACK HEALY and DAN FROSCH

lead_paragraph: The suspected gunman, James E. Holmes, was described as being eerily calm and detached from the chaos he had created.

headline.main: At Hearing, Police Recall Details of Horror at Colorado Movie Theater
headline.print_headline: At Hearing, Police Recall Details of Horror at Colorado Movie Theater
